DefaultEvent.Description: A sad tale of failed ambition.
DefaultEvent.Name: Notes on a wasteland

ChildBranches.Name: $Port Report -> 港湾報告書$Compile a Port Report

DefaultEvent.Description: $[Bb]lemmigan -> ブレミガン$The blemmigan scampers away, chirruping happily. The remnants of the town provide an abundance of potential nests and food for its propagation. Fully content with its new home, it begins its feast by sinking its beak deep into the nearest rat carcass.
DefaultEvent.Name: A feeding frenzy

ChildBranches.Name: $[Bb]lemmigan -> ブレミガン$Release a blemmigan
ChildBranches.Description: Perhaps mushrooms will thrive where the rodents couldn't?

DefaultEvent.Description: Tiny glimmers mark where the rodents' treasure met its end. What pieces remain are too small to be worth collecting, even as souvenirs.
DefaultEvent.Name: Detritus

ChildBranches.Name: $[Ss]cintillack -> シンティラック$Search for the blue scintillack
ChildBranches.Description: It may have survived the island's fall.

DefaultEvent.Description: $Khan -> カーン, Khan's Heart -> カーンの心臓, Pigmote Isle -> ピグモート・アイル$Pigmote Isle is in no state to receive this or any other delivery. You will have to take it to Khan's Heart instead.
DefaultEvent.Name: Redirected

ChildBranches.Name: $Mr Sacks -> ミスター・サックス$A delivery for Mr Sacks
ChildBranches.Description: This should be far enough from London.

Description: A few survivors still scavenge through the remnants, hissing whenever you approach. They have little worth protecting. Raiders, pirates and other opportunists have wasted no time picking Pigmote to the bones.
Name: $Pigmote Isle -> ピグモート・アイル$The Ruins of Pigmote Isle
